articles.title: Tata Nexon EV and Tiago EV prices cut in February - CarTrade.com
articles.description: Tata Motors has announced a massive price cut for Nexon and Tiago electric vehicles. The prices of Tata Nexon EV have been slashed by up to Rs. 1.20 l - Tiago EV News at CarTrade.

articles.title: ITC share price nears upper band of historical consolidation. How to trade next week? - The Economic Times
articles.description: “Recently, large-cap stocks have experienced robust buying, including large-cap auto, banking, and IT stocks. Despite this, strong profit booking in small-cap stocks has contributed to underperformance in the small-cap index compared to the Nifty.”
